name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe vera is a succulent plant species of the genus Aloe. It originates from the Arabian Peninsula but grows wild in tropical, semi-tropical, and arid climates around the world. The species is cultivated for agricultural and medicinal uses. The plant's gel-filled leaves have been used for thousands of years in traditional medicine to treat wounds, burns, and skin conditions. It is one of the most commercially important medicinal plants worldwide.
